thread.title: Patrick Struthers
thread.title_full: NZ Rockshop reviewed by Patrick Struthers

author: Patrick Struthers
title: Patrick Struthers
text:
I have previously reviewed the Christchurch Rockshop, today I endeavoured to place a edit onto the original review, I had no luck, so here's my edit :)
I would like to express my deepest respect to Nick who called me today, you have honestly outdone yourself, the level of respect and the care you took, it blew me away, I could not recommend dealing with Nick any higher,
Just the fact he actually read my review and took the time to try find out more, it showed a genuine concern and appreciation for customers.
I thank you Nick for all you have done,
I very much look forward to doing business with you soon.
Take care
